Class WorkingContext

java.lang.Object
application.WorkingContext
public class WorkingContext extends Object
Manages the working context (current directory) for file operations. Ensures that all operations stay within a designated root directory.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static WorkingContext getInstance(String rootDirectory) throws SQLException
      Gets the singleton instance of WorkingContext.
      Parameters:
      rootDirectory - the root directory path
      Returns:
      the WorkingContext instance
      Throws:
      SQLException - if initialization fails

    • displayPath

      public String displayPath(Path path)
      Gets the display representation of a path.
      Parameters:
      path - the path to display
      Returns:
      the formatted path for display

    • pwd

      public String pwd()
      Gets the current working directory relative to the root. Logs the PWD operation to the journalisation system.
      Returns:
      the relative path as a string

    • resolve

      public Path resolve(String input)
      Resolves the input path against the current directory, ensuring it stays within the root.
      Parameters:
      input - the input path to resolve
      Returns:
      the resolved Path
      Throws:
      FileAccessException - if the resolved path is outside the root

    • getCurrent

      public Path getCurrent()
      Gets the current working directory as a Path object.
      Returns:
      the current Path

    • changeDirectory

      public String changeDirectory(String input)
      Changes the current working directory based on the input. Supports ".", "..", and "/" navigation. Logs the CD operation to the journalisation system.
      Parameters:
      input - the input path to change to
      Returns:
      success or error message

    • getRoot

      public Path getRoot()
      Gets the root directory path.
      Returns:
      the root Path
